name: Winter Wonderland Project
description:
Welcome to the Winter Wonderland Project - Beach Themed! Inspired by Pixar's Knick Knack, this terrain project contains many elements and items such as mountains, tall grass, and much more! In this project, one can also find a snowman resembling the snowman collectible in the short film. The snowman can be seen on the beach shore looking out towards the water, trying to find fellow collectibles to enjoy the beach with. 

Use the arrow keys and space bar to move around the scene, and the mouse/trackpad to look around. 

Credits for assets used:

- Sand texture by microstock77 (https://www.123rf.com/profile_microstock77)

- Mountain Rock texture by Giles Hodges (https://seamless-pixels.blogspot.com/2014/12/mountain-rock-seamless-texture-2048x2048.html)

- Grass texture by agava (http://fatamorgana26.blogspot.com/2013/04/zielono-i-wiosennie.html)

- Miracle Water texture by Icons8 (https://icons8.com/articles/best-photoshop-water-textures/)

- Cloud image from pngimg.com (http://pngimg.com/download/4307)

- Snowman Prefab by Angry Mesh (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/free-snowman-105123)

- Tree Package by Speed Tree (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/speedtree/free-speedtrees-pa...)

- Beach Essentials Pack by Ferocious Industries (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/free-beach-essentials-asset-pack-...)
